title: Freebøx Internet box, how to access HDD , root?
content:
This is a question rather for french stack users. I wonder how I can read my Freebox server HDD (actually it i flash memory), as 
root
? Or, at least, how I could see Terminal of the box ? (It is 
Ubuntu
based, at least 
Debian
)

answers_data.content:
(It is 
Ubuntu
based, at least 
Debian
) According to Wikipedia, it's BusyBox. I wonder how I can read my Freebox server HDD (actually it i flash memory), as 
root
? Or, at least, how I could see Terminal of the box ? Based on the content in http://www.f-x.fr/wikini, it appears you would need to desolder the flash memory.

comments.text: Thank you. Why is it better to build on BusyBox rather than a Debian distro ?
That question would likely be better asked at superuser.com
Yes, but this is to be marked off-topic*, too general.

answers_data.content:
If you are still using a V4 version, it seems to be much more simple:
Pénétrez une FreeBoxPerso V4 avec un simple Trombone
